testcase.name: runScenario["Find pets by status", "Pet Management API"](18)
testcase.system-out: When I send a GET request to "/pet/findByStatus" with status "available" # steps.PetSteps.i_send_a_get_request_to_with_status(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the response status code should be 200 # steps.CommonSteps.the_response_status_code_should_be(int) And the response should be an array # steps.PetSteps.the_response_should_be_an_array() And all pets in response should have status "available" # steps.PetSteps.all_pets_in_response_should_have_status(java.lang.String)
